quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Best Actress
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, find, field. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who was the first Australian actress to win the Academy Award for Best Actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicole Kidman

questions.question: What did Jake find in Hollis pond in the film Chinatown?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pair of glasses

questions.question: What was Escobars last line of dialogue in the movie Chinatown?

options.text: Just get him the hell out of here

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Just get him the hell out of here

questions.question: At the 71st Academy Awards in 1999, both Judi Dench and Cate Blanchett were nominated for Academy Awards for Best Supporting Actress and Best Actress respectively, for portraying the same character in different movies. Name the character.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Queen Elizabeth I

questions.question: What actress won the Academy Awards for Best Actress for the 1960 movie BUtterfield 8?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elizabeth Taylor

questions.question: In the movie Chinatown, how did Jakes operatives tell what time Mulray drove away?

options.text: They placed watches under his tires.
They put a microphone in his backseat.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They placed watches under his tires.

questions.question: Meryl Streeps performance in this 1982 movie brought her her first Academy Award for Best Actress.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sophies Choice

questions.question: Name the first African American actress to win the Academy Award for Best Actress.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Halle Berry

questions.question: For what county did Chinatown character Claude Mulvihill serve as sheriff?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ventura

questions.question: What popular character did Sally Field portray in the first movie that brought her an Academy Award for Best Actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Norma Rae

questions.question: What was the last movie for which Katharine Hepburn won an Academy Award for Best Actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On Golden Pond

questions.question: Who was on the boat in Echo Park with Hollis I. Mulwray in the film Chinatown?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Katherine Cross

questions.question: What movie brought Kate Winslet her first Academy Award for Best Actress?

options.text: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Reader

questions.question: What actress won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance in the 1978 drama movie Coming Home?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jane Fonda

questions.question: Susan Sarandon won her first Academy Award for Best Actress for this 1995 drama movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dead Man Walking

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Fire
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, leader, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who plays Alfred in the record breaking 2008 movie, The Dark Knight?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Caine

questions.question: What pet did Samuel Ramos and his wife Lisa buy for their daughter in the 2004 movie Man on Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dog

questions.question: How does John explain the scars on his hand when asked by the little girl in the 2004 action thriller movie Man on Fire?

options.text: He says it was a birth defect.
He says a shark bit him.
He does not answer and remains silent.
He tells her he has no idea.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He says it was a birth defect.

questions.question: What Grammy award-winning singer and songwriter played the role of Samuel Ramos in the 2004 action movie Man on Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marc Anthony

questions.question: Harrison Ford did his own stunts for Indiana Jones and the Crystal Skull.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What signature object does Hellboy always have in his mouth in 2008s Hellboy II: The Golden Army?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Cigar

questions.question: What is the nickname of the leader of the kidnappers in the 2004 action thriller movie Man on Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Voice

questions.question: In what big city is the 2004 action thriller movie Man on Fire set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mexico City

questions.question: What actor played the role of Paul Rayburn, Johns old CIA sidekick, in the 2004 action movie Man on Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christopher Walken

questions.question: What place did the 2008 movie Iron Man have on the list of all time best opening weekends when it first came out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 10th

questions.question: An emblem of what saint does the little girl give to John in the 2004 action drama movie Man on Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: St. Jude

questions.question: What kind of competition does Dakota Fannings character win in the 2004 action movie Man on Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A swimming race

questions.question: What was the name of the villain in the 2008 film The Incredible Hulk?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Abomination

questions.question: What was the name of Dakota Fannings character in the 2004 movie Man on Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lupita

questions.question: What name does the little girl in the 2004 movie Man on Fire give to her favorite teddy bear?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Creasy

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Plane and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stars, snakes. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who played flight attendant Claire Miller in the movie Snakes on a plane?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Julianna Margulies

questions.question: Where do Troy Bolton and Gabriella Montez meet in the film High School Musical?

options.text: at a New Years Eve party

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: at a New Years Eve party

questions.question: Zac Efron made his acting debut in High School Musical.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Troy gives Gabriella a necklace in High School Musical 2.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: How much experience did Troy have, when he volunteered to land the plane in the 2006 movie Snakes on a Plane?

options.text: He used to fly for the Air Force.
He had two thousand hours of video game experience on the PlayStation 2.
He was an avid model airplane pilot.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He had two thousand hours of video game experience on the PlayStation 2.

questions.question: What High School Musical character was the head of the science club?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Taylor

questions.question: Which of the characters in the film Snakes on a Plane was bitten by a snake on the chest but was not harmed because he was wearing a bulletproof vest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sean Jones

questions.question: Vanessa Hudgens, one of the stars in High School Musical, made her acting debut in the film Thirteen.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When the producers of the movie Snakes on a Plane wanted to change the title, actor Samuel L. Jackson protested, saying the only reason he took the job was because of the title.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Why were the snakes on the plane in the movie Snakes on a Plane?

options.text: A man wanted to wreck havoc on a plane, as a protest against an air company.
They had to bring down the plane and kill a witness, who was going to testify about a murder
They were being transported to a zoo.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They had to bring down the plane and kill a witness, who was going to testify about a murder

questions.question: Hancock is the first movie in which Will Smith plays a superhero.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the following was NOT used to kill the snakes in the movie Snakes on a Plane?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gun

questions.question: Who was/were the first victim(s) of the snakes in the movie Snakes on a Plane?

options.text: a man urinating in a bathroom
a couple having sex in a bathroom

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a couple having sex in a bathroom

questions.question: High School Musical was released in 2005.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was the planes destination in the film Snakes on a Plane?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Los Angeles

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and John Dillinger
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, stars. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the Clark Gable movie that John Dillinger and Anna Sage are watching together in the Biograph Theater in the 2009 Public Enemies movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Manhattan Melodrama

questions.question: What is the fate of John Dillinger in the 2009 movie Public Enemies?

options.text: He breaks his girlfriend out of jail and they get married.
He manages to escape from the FBI and becomes an honest man.
He commits suicide before the FBI agents could arrest him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He is shot dead.

questions.question: What 1987 movie is this quote from: They can get to anyone, they can kill anybody. You want them to know who you are? Do you??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Believers

questions.question: What type of character is Anna Sage, played by actress Branka Katic in the Public Enemies movie from 2009?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prostitute

questions.question: Which of these charming actors stars in the 2009 movie Public Enemies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Johnny Depp

questions.question: What is the name of John Dillingers girlfriend in the 2009 movie Public Enemies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billie

questions.question: What does John Dillingers girlfriend do when she is beaten during the interrogation following her arrest in the 2009 Public Enemies movie?

options.text: She seduces the interrogator and manages to escape.
She decides to speak and discloses Johns location.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She does not betray John.

questions.question: Which of these French actresses stars in the Public Enemies movie from 2009 as criminal John Dillingers love interest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marion Cotillard

questions.question: What 1980 movie contains the following quote: I understand you lost your wife and daughter a little while ago. Maybe it shook you up. Maybe too much... *Maybe*, you need help.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Changeling

questions.question: For the 1994s massive movie hit The Lion King Rowan Atkinson gave his voice to this bird character.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zazu

questions.question: What kind of criminal was John Dillinger, a historical figure and leading character in the 2009 Public Enemies movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bank robber

questions.question: Identify the 1980 movie from this quote: Hey, professor! I recognize these teeth. This is Felipe Ocanya. He knew the jungle as well as I do.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cannibal Holocaust

questions.question: Actor Christian Bale stars in the 2009 crime movie Public Enemies. What type of character does he play?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: FBI agent

questions.question: In the 2003s movie Johnny English Rowan Atkinson starred alongside this beautiful Australian singer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Natalie Imbruglia

questions.question: What are the last words that John Dillinger says in the Public Enemies 2009 movie?

options.text: Man should never forget where he comes from, and where hes going.
Tell Billie for me Bye bye Blackbird.
All is far behind me. I am ready.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tell Billie for me Bye bye Blackbird.
